wikipedia_page.main:
Iain Alexander Douglas Blair Cochrane, 15th Earl of Dundonald (born 17 February 1961), styled Lord Cochrane until 1986, is a Scottish peer.
Dundonald is the only son of Iain Cochrane, 14th Earl of Dundonald and his first wife Aphra Farquhar (d. 1972).He was educated at Wellington College and RAC Cirencester. He succeeded his father in the earldom in 1986, and became chairman of Duneth Securities in the same year.On 4 July 1987, he married M. Beatrice L. Russo, of Gibraltar, by whom he had two sons and a daughter before their marriage was dissolved in 2011:
Archie Iain Thomas Cochrane, Lord Cochrane (b. 1991)
Lady Marina Aphra Mariola Cochrane (b. 1992)
Hon. James Douglas Richard Cochrane (b. 1995)He has been a director of Anglo Digital, Ltd., since 2000. Dundonald lives at Lochnell Castle and is the honorary Chilean consul to Scotland.
